Contributor: Chorley & Pickersgill, printer.; Great Britain. Parliamentary Recruiting Committee, publisher.;
Note: Date based on dates if 1st World War. "Poster No. 85c." Orientation: Horizontal.
Description: Text says that both the serviceman and the worker are needed to serve the guns; so fill up the ranks, and pile up the munitions. Illustration shows a serviceman shaking hands with a worker.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
Series: Poster (Great Britain. Parliamentary Recruiting Committee) ; no. 85c.

Title: We're both needed to serve the guns!
Source: From: We're both needed to serve the guns!
